SEARCH

Package main

package main
The main package provides core components and functionalities for the application. It includes classes responsible for asset management, battle systems, collision checks, configuration settings, event handling, game panels, input handling, main application entry point, sound management, utility tools, and user interface elements.

The main classes in this package are:

  • AssetSetter - Manages the loading and setting of assets for the application.
  • BattleSystem - Implements the core logic for the battle system in the application.
  • CollisionCheck - Provides functionality for checking collisions between game entities.
  • Config - Manages and provides access to configuration settings for the application.
  • EventRect - Represents an event rectangle that triggers specific actions in the game.
  • GamePanel - Represents the main game panel where the game is rendered.
  • KeyHandler - Handles keyboard input for the application.
  • Main - The main entry point for the application.
  • Sound - Manages the sound-related functionalities for the application.
  • Toolbox - Provides utility methods and tools for various tasks in the application.
  • UI - Contains user interface elements and functionalities for the application.

Each class in this package plays a crucial role in different aspects of the application, contributing to its overall functionality. For detailed information about each class, refer to their respective documentation.

Since:
2023-11-27

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AssetSetter
    The AssetSetter class is responsible for setting up various game assets such as objects, NPCs, and monsters.
    BattleSystem
    The BattleSystem class handles turn-based battles between the player's party and monsters.
    CollisionCheck
    The CollisionCheck class is responsible for handling collision detection between entities and game elements.
    Config
    Handles the configuration settings for the game.
    EventRect
    Represents a rectangular area used for defining events in the game.
    Events
    Manages and checks events in the game world.
    GamePanel
    The main panel for the game, responsible for rendering and updating the game state.
    KeyHandler
    Key handler for the game implementing the KeyListener interface.
    Main
    Main class for the game.
    Sound
    The Sound class manages audio clips for the game.
    Toolbox
    The Toolbox class provides utility methods for image manipulation.
    UI
    This class represents the user interface (UI) for the game.
